foundationday000.name: Foundation Day
foundationday000.description: Absalom's celebration of both its founding and the new year.

longnight0000000.name: Longnight
longnight0000000.description: Revelers stay awake through the longest winter night to defy the darkness and greet the dawn.

vaultday00000000.name: Vault Day
vaultday00000000.description: Annual holiday held in honor of Abadar.

ascensiondayaraz.name: Ascension Day (Arazni)
ascensiondayaraz.description: The day chosen by Arazni to celebrate her regaining her freedom and emerging as a full-fledged god.

ritualwhipsting0.name: Ritual of the Whip Sting
ritualwhipsting0.description: The clergy of Calistria act as intermediaries in deciding a public act of vengeance to settle a personal dispute.

merrymead0000000.name: Merrymead
merrymead0000000.description: A celebration of approaching spring where the previous year's alcohol is consumed.

feastofvigor0000.name: Feast of Vigor
feastofvigor0000.description: A Calistril celebration, the feast refers to a celebration of pleasure between lovers and strangers.

loyaltyday000000.name: Loyalty Day
loyaltyday000000.description: Chelaxian holiday also celebrated by the Church of Asmodeus, observing the Treaty of Egorian that declared House Thrune the victors of the Chelaxian Civil War.

leapday000000000.name: Leap Day
leapday000000000.description: Followers of Mahathallah mark this rare day as Fateless Day, a time outside normal fate.

dayofbones000000.name: Day of Bones
dayofbones000000.description: A solemn holiday honoring Pharasma where the dead are remembered and tombs are tended.

mourningfell0000.name: Mourningfell
mourningfell0000.description: The day Arazni was slain in battle by the Whispering Tyrant in 3823, the church of Iomedae is solemn, paying respects to the memory of Aroden's herald, while the church of Arazni celebrates the day in honor of their goddess's resilience.

firstbloom000000.name: Firstbloom
firstbloom000000.description: Fertility dances celebrate the coming of spring at the vernal equinox.

daysofwrathspr00.name: Days of Wrath
daysofwrathspr00.description: A Chelaxian and Asmodean holiday celebrated each solstice and equinox. Various contests and blood sports are held, through which slaves and servants can be freed, debts can be erased, and gold can be won.

plantingweek0000.name: Planting Week
plantingweek0000.description: A holy week dedicated to Erastil when farmers engage in heavy field work.

currentseve0000.name: Currentseve
currentseve0000.description: A solemn occasion where families of sailors and rivermen pray to Gozreh for safe passage during the year.

taxfest000000000.name: Taxfest
taxfest000000000.description: Priests of Abadar accompany tax collectors to ensure fair taxation, followed by a feast.

findcayhound0000.name: Find of the Cayhound
findcayhound0000.description: Celebrating the day god Cayden Cailean met his loyal companion Thunder, abandoned dogs find new homes among his followers and competitions are held where owner and dog must work together to win.

remembrancemoon0.name: Remembrance Moon
remembrancemoon0.description: A solemn holiday honoring those who fell in the Shining Crusade against the Whispering Tyrant.

ascendnorgorber0.name: Ascendance Night (Norgorber)
ascendnorgorber0.description: A celebration of the secretive former-mortal Norgorber's ascension to divinity.

apprenticeday000.name: Apprentice Appreciation Day
apprenticeday000.description: Celebration observed by followers of Nethys, an apprentice's work is praised by the master, and the apprentice can demonstrate their improvement with a duel. If the master sees improvement in the duel, the master is to give their apprentice a gift of gratitude.

burningblades000.name: Burning Blades
burningblades000.description: A festival for Sarenrae culminating in sacred dances performed with flaming blades.

darknesseternal0.name: Darkness Eternal
darknesseternal0.description: Followers of Asmodeus lament the beginning of summer.

sunwroughtfestiv.name: Sunwrought Festival
sunwroughtfestiv.description: The summer solstice honors Sarenrae with fireworks and reenactments of her battle with Rovagug.

daysofwrathsum00.name: Days of Wrath
daysofwrathsum00.description: A Chelaxian and Asmodean holiday celebrated each solstice and equinox. Various contests and blood sports are held, through which slaves and servants can be freed, debts can be erased, and gold can be won.

ritualstardustsm.name: Ritual of Stardust
ritualstardustsm.description: One of the few holidays in honor of Desna. Held of both the summer and winter solstices, the best day for travel and best night for stargazing. Followers gather at dusk, light enormous bonfires, and hold feasts.

archersday000000.name: Archer's Day
archersday000000.description: Erastil's holy day celebrated with archery contests and livestock bartering.

inheritorsascen.name: Inheritor's Ascendance (Iomedae)
inheritorsascen.description: Originally called Herald's Day, this date honors when Aroden chose Iomedae to become his herald, replacing Arazni after her death. The day was renamed after the death of Aroden.

armasse000000000.name: Armasse
armasse000000000.description: A day to train commoners in combat, honoring Iomedae's martial legacy.

dayofinheritor00.name: Day of the Inheritor (Iomedae)
dayofinheritor00.description: This day marks the welcoming of Aroden's faithful into the flock of Iomedae after the death of Aroden.

daysofwrathaut00.name: Days of Wrath
daysofwrathaut00.description: A Chelaxian and Asmodean holiday celebrated each solstice and equinox. Various contests and blood sports are held, through which slaves and servants can be freed, debts can be erased, and gold can be won.

swallowtailfesti.name: Swallowtail Festival
swallowtailfesti.description: The first day of autumn honors Desna with feasting and the release of butterflies.

harvestfeast0000.name: Harvest Feast
harvestfeast0000.description: The autumnal equinox celebration marks the harvest's end.

ascendanceday000.name: Ascendance Day
ascendanceday000.description: Iomedae's divine ascension is celebrated with ceremonies honoring her rise to goddess.

jestercap0000000.name: Jestercap
jestercap0000000.description: A day of pranks and practical jokes particularly favored by gnomes.

allbirth00000000.name: Allbirth
allbirth00000000.description: A Lamashran occult celebration of monsters. In Katapesh, and increasingly elsewhere, it is more broadly celebrated as a gruesome masquerade popular among dromaars and goblins.

sevenveils000000.name: Seven Veils
sevenveils000000.description: Sivanah's sacred masquerade ball where participants disguise their identity behind magical veils.

abjurantday00000.name: Abjurant Day
abjurantday00000.description: A Nethysian holiday of cooperation between neighbors to shore up mutual defenses and train allies in magic.

evokingday000000.name: Evoking Day
evokingday000000.description: A longstanding Nethysian holiday, it has always featured a grand meal in the afternoon and a wondrous exhibition of brilliant and explosive magic once the sun sets.

transmutatum0000.name: Transmutatum
transmutatum0000.description: A day of reflection and self-improvement, many followers of Nethys begin research and crafting projects on this day.

shadowchaining00.name: The Shadowchaining
shadowchaining00.description: Clerics of Zon-Kuthon commemorate the animals that have been influenced by the shadows over the milennia that Nidal has been under their god's protection. Those with animal companions walk the streets receiving prayers from passerby, and afterwards these animals are sent to attack a captured enemy of the faith.

winterweek000000.name: Winter Week
winterweek000000.description: A traditional feast serving as a time for courting and gathering with friends.

ascendcayden0000.name: Ascension Day (Cayden Cailean)
ascendcayden0000.description: A very informal holiday for a very informal deity, it commemorates the day Cayden Cailean ascended to godhood. The exact date of his ascension is unknown, as he was drunk when it happened.

dayoforder000000.name: Day of Order
dayoforder000000.description: Commemorating the murder of Ihys at the hands of his brother Asmodeus, while the exact date is unknown the church chose the 11th to coincide with the ascension of Cayden Cailean, another god who represents chaos.

candlemark000000.name: Candlemark
candlemark000000.description: The winter solstice honors Sarenrae's healing power on the sun's weakest day.

crystalhue000000.name: Crystalhue
crystalhue000000.description: A winter solstice celebration of art and courtship honoring Shelyn with crystal prisms.

daysofwrathwin00.name: Days of Wrath
daysofwrathwin00.description: A Chelaxian and Asmodean holiday celebrated each solstice and equinox. Various contests and blood sports are held, through which slaves and servants can be freed, debts can be erased, and gold can be won. One this final event of the year, victors of the last three bouts fight to the death, with the final champion being named a baronet and granted a plot of land.

ritualstardustwn.name: Ritual of Stardust
ritualstardustwn.description: One of the few holidays in honor of Desna. Held for both the summer and winter solstices, the best day for travel and best night for stargazing. Followers gather at dusk, light enormous bonfires, and hold feasts.

nightofthepale00.name: Night of the Pale
nightofthepale00.description: The last night of the year when ghosts of the recently dead manifest to visit their former homes.
